thread.title: BRIEF-Moody's says Philippine Banks' Robust Loan Growth Lifts 2017 Earnings, But Will Continue To Pressure Capitalization‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Moody's says Philippine Banks' Robust Loan Growth Lifts 2017 Earnings, But Will Continue To Pressure Capitalization‍​
text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Moody’s :
* : PHILIPPINE BANKS’ ROBUST LOAN GROWTH LIFTS 2017 EARNINGS, BUT WILL CONTINUE TO PRESSURE CAPITALIZATION‍​
* SAYS PHILIPPINE BANKS’ 2018 NET INTEREST MARGINS WILL IMPROVE AFTER STAYING LARGELY STEADY IN 2017, AND LOAN GROWTH WILL REMAIN ROBUST
* SAYS PHILIPPINE BANKS’ CREDIT COSTS WERE STEADY AT LOW LEVELS IN 2017, BUT WILL RISE IN 2018
* PHILIPPINE BANKS WILL SHOW MARGIN IMPROVEMENTS IN 2018 AND COMBINED WITH CONTINUED ROBUST LOAN GROWTH, WILL BOOST EARNINGS AND PROFITABILITY Source text for Eikon:
